Mod3_Description: While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, your other Skills gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100}|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.
Mod2_Description: While {c_important}Frenzy{/c} is granting {c_number}[{SF_1} * 3 * 100|%+|]{/c} bonus Attack Speed, it also generates {c_number}[SF_8]{/c} additional Fury.
Mod4_Description: You gain {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each stack of {c_important}Frenzy{/c} you currently have.
simple_desc: Primary Skill: Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, increasing your attack speed with each hit.
name: Frenzy
